JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Are you looking for a job in customer service? Then this is the opportunity to join an exciting and ambitious young company!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Position: Customer Service Captain

Hey Captain is looking for passionate people to welcome customers and sell tickets for our boat tours. If you are a service-minded and open person and share our passion for giving guests a truly social experience maybe this is the job for you?

 

About Hey Captain

  • We are a young Copenhagen canal tour company established in May 2017.
  • We believe that people are looking for genuine experiences and our mission is to deliver social sailing; where a canal tour becomes a social interactive experience shared by guests and the captain
  • We are a team of young ambitious people who have a passion for sailing.

 

About the position

  • Your main job will be to greet, inform, and sell our boat tours to guests. Your ability to be service-minded, open and communicative is key. 
  • You will be working both with physical communication at our sales point on Ofelia Plads, and in our office responding to incoming request via email and phone.
  • You will be working mainly outdoors in the center of Copenhagen at Ofelia Plads, so there is good opportunity to make the most of the summer.
  • You have the opportunity to influence your own working hours as we are open 7 days a week and we are looking for people for both full time positions and part time positions by the hour.
  • An opportunity to join a very ambitious start-up journey where we want to have fun while making a real positive impact on the guests we invite onboard.

 

Your qualifications

  • Minimum 18 years old.
  • You are positive and generally look at the brighter side of life.
  • You have an outgoing personality and enjoy talking with many different people during a day.
  • You are service-minded and have a good understanding of our guests' needs and how we can fulfill these.
  • You keep a cool head in busy situations, and have the overview of the schedule to support our captains
  • You are able to communicate clearly in writing both in Danish and English
  • Experience in customer service is a plus but if you have the right mindset, we will teach what you need to know.
  • You are serious about delivering high quality, and value a strong feedback culture with the opportunity to develop and learn.
  • You are fluent in English and Danish, it is a plus if you also master an additional language

 

Practicalities

To apply: Please send your CV and a short motivational letter.

For questions or more information please contact us by email.

 

Timeline for interview process:

  • Please send your application as early as possible as we will evaluate them on an on-going basis
  • You can expect to hear back from us within a week
  • Interviews will take place from the beginning of March and throughout the spring

 

www.heycaptain.dk
